com.yahoo.sketches.tuple

Class DoubleSummaryFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.sketches.tuple.DoubleSummaryFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SummaryFactory<DoubleSummary>

    public final class DoubleSummaryFactory
extends Object
implements SummaryFactory<DoubleSummary>
    Factory for DoubleSummary. It supports three modes of operation of DoubleSummary: Sum, Min and Max.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DoubleSummaryFactory()
      Creates an instance of DoubleSummaryFactory with default mode

      Creates an instance of DoubleSummaryFactory with a given mode

      • fromMemory

        public static DeserializeResult<DoubleSummaryFactory> fromMemory(com.yahoo.memory.Memory mem)
        This is deprecated and exists here just to test compatibility with previous serialization format. In the current serial version of sketches factories are not serialized. Creates an instance of the DoubleSummaryFactory given a serialized representation
        Parameters:
        mem - Memory object with serialized DoubleSummaryFactory
        Returns:
        DeserializedResult object, which contains a DoubleSummaryFactory object and number of bytes read from the Memory
